title: What is H-1B lottery scam? Who is Indian-American Kandi Srinivasa Reddy behind this?
content: Reddy told TOI that there is nothing illegal in what he did. "When multiple visa entries are filed, the choice is up to the employees to choose which company they would like. From 20924, changes were made, and passport numbers need to be entered. Now, if multiple entries are filled, it will reflect everywhere," he said.
summary: Reddy told TOI that there is nothing illegal in what he did. "When multiple visa entries are filed, the choice is up to the employees to choose which company they would like. From 20924, changes were made, and passport numbers need to be entered. Now, if multiple entries are filled, it will reflect everywhere," he said.

title: Hezbollah leader warns of 'new phase' in conflict after Israeli airstrike
'Would Putin give an interview?' Gershkovich puts a request in Russian form finalizing his release
content: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich walked free Thursday as part of the largest East-West prisoner swap since the Cold War -- in what could be seen as a big victory of the Joe Biden administration. Joe Biden said the prisoner swap is a powerful example of why it's vital to have friends in this world -- as he credited the allies for the multi-country swap deal that set two dozen people free.
summary: Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich walked free Thursday as part of the largest East-West prisoner swap since the Cold War -- in what could be seen as a big victory of the Joe Biden administration. Joe Biden said the prisoner swap is a powerful example of why it's vital to have friends in this world -- as he credited the allies for the multi-country swap deal that set two dozen people free.

title: Trump explains why he chose JD Vance: 'He's self-made, no well-connected father'
content: ​Former president Donald Trump said he has all the respect for his running mate JD Vance despite the several controversies around him. On his 'childless cat ladies' comment, Trump said JD Vance is a family-oriented man and what he meant is that family experience is valuable, according to Trump's interpretation. On being asked why he chose JD Vance -- during the rocky interview at the Black journalists' convention at Chicago Wednesday, Trump said JD Vance is a very strong believer in work and working men and women who have been treated unfairly.
summary: ​Former president Donald Trump said he has all the respect for his running mate JD Vance despite the several controversies around him. On his 'childless cat ladies' comment, Trump said JD Vance is a family-oriented man and what he meant is that family experience is valuable, according to Trump's interpretation. On being asked why he chose JD Vance -- during the rocky interview at the Black journalists' convention at Chicago Wednesday, Trump said JD Vance is a very strong believer in work and working men and women who have been treated unfairly.

title: Human trafficking bust at San Diego Comic-Con: Undercovers officers rescue ten victims including 16-year-old, 14 arrested
content: During San Diego's Comic-Con, undercover officers rescued several human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and arrested 14 people attempting to buy sex. The operation, involving multiple law enforcement agencies, highlighted the exploitation of large events by traffickers. Comic-Con officials expressed their readiness to assist authorities. San Diego Comic-Con is famous as one of the largest pop culture events worldwide.
summary: During San Diego's Comic-Con, undercover officers rescued several human trafficking victims, including a 16-year-old girl, and arrested 14 people attempting to buy sex. The operation, involving multiple law enforcement agencies, highlighted the exploitation of large events by traffickers. Comic-Con officials expressed their readiness to assist authorities. San Diego Comic-Con is famous as one of the largest pop culture events worldwide.

title: Ex-wife of Kamala Harris' husband has this prediction about Usha Vance
content: Kerstin has a bone to pick with JD Vance in the 'childless cat ladies' row targeted at Kamala Harris as that dragged her two children Cole and Ella into the controversy. They call step-mother Kamala Harris 'Momala' and both Ella and Kerstin shielded Kamala Harris from the 'childless' attack.

title: Trump denigrates South America, Asia, and Africa, saying they are sending criminals, rapists and lunatics to US
content: Former US President Donald Trump accused multiple global regions of sending criminals and mentally ill individuals to the US, blaming Kamala Harris for the alleged 'gigantic invasion.' Trump's claims, lacking evidence, were criticized by fact-checkers who noted his rhetoric as dangerous. This attack comes as he falls behind Harris in presidential polls.
summary: Former US President Donald Trump accused multiple global regions of sending criminals and mentally ill individuals to the US, blaming Kamala Harris for the alleged 'gigantic invasion.' Trump's claims, lacking evidence, were criticized by fact-checkers who noted his rhetoric as dangerous. This attack comes as he falls behind Harris in presidential polls.

title: US proposes ban on junk airline charges for seating parents next to kids
content: The US Department of Transportation announced plans to prohibit airlines from charging families with young children extra fees to sit together on flights. President Joe Biden highlighted this proposal, stating it could save families up to $200 per roundtrip. This move is part of a broader effort to eliminate unfair fees and enhance consumer protection in air travel.
summary: The US Department of Transportation announced plans to prohibit airlines from charging families with young children extra fees to sit together on flights. President Joe Biden highlighted this proposal, stating it could save families up to $200 per roundtrip. This move is part of a broader effort to eliminate unfair fees and enhance consumer protection in air travel.

title: When Trump said Putin would release Evan Gershkovich only if...
content: As Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich -- arrested in Russia -- was freed Thursday in a multi-country prisoner swap in Turkey, former US president Donald Trump's recent statement on the issue started doing the rounds as Trump said Putin would free the US journalist only when Trump is elected. Gershkovich "will be released almost immediately after the Election, but definitely before I assume Office," Trump wrote on Truth Social.
summary: As Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich -- arrested in Russia -- was freed Thursday in a multi-country prisoner swap in Turkey, former US president Donald Trump's recent statement on the issue started doing the rounds as Trump said Putin would free the US journalist only when Trump is elected. Gershkovich "will be released almost immediately after the Election, but definitely before I assume Office," Trump wrote on Truth Social.

title: Co-pilot faints mid-flight, triggering rare 'red alert'; plane lands safely
content: An easyJet co-pilot fainted during flight EZY2459 from London to Lisbon, prompting a 'red alert.' The Airbus A320, carrying 193 passengers, landed safely, and paramedics treated the ill co-pilot, who was taken to Lisbon’s Santa Maria Hospital. The flight's captain landed the plane without compromising safety. Passengers faced a three-hour delay on the return flight.
summary: An easyJet co-pilot fainted during flight EZY2459 from London to Lisbon, prompting a 'red alert.' The Airbus A320, carrying 193 passengers, landed safely, and paramedics treated the ill co-pilot, who was taken to Lisbon’s Santa Maria Hospital. The flight's captain landed the plane without compromising safety. Passengers faced a three-hour delay on the return flight.

title: Michigan woman discovers $207K lottery win through 'spam' email
content: A Michigan woman discovered that she had won $207,199 in a lottery through an email in her spam folder which she earlier thought as suspicious . She had unknowingly participated in the BIG CA$H Second Chance Jackpot through online game play. After verifying the email, she confirmed her win. The woman plans to use the windfall will to pay off bills and make investments.
summary: A Michigan woman discovered that she had won $207,199 in a lottery through an email in her spam folder which she earlier thought as suspicious . She had unknowingly participated in the BIG CA$H Second Chance Jackpot through online game play. After verifying the email, she confirmed her win. The woman plans to use the windfall will to pay off bills and make investments.

title: 'Thank you Kamala': Trump shares Harris 'Indian heritage' photo amid row
content: Former US president Donald Trump Wednesday said vice president Kamala Harris has been 'turning Black' and he did not know a few years ago that Kamala Harris was Black. Speaking at a Black journalists' convention in Chicago, Trump wondered whether Kamala Harris is an Indian or Black -- which invited massive backlash including from the White House which termed Trump's comments as 'repulsive, insulting'.
summary: Former US president Donald Trump Wednesday said vice president Kamala Harris has been 'turning Black' and he did not know a few years ago that Kamala Harris was Black. Speaking at a Black journalists' convention in Chicago, Trump wondered whether Kamala Harris is an Indian or Black -- which invited massive backlash including from the White House which termed Trump's comments as 'repulsive, insulting'.

title: 'Just like Ivanka Trump': Laura Loomer's 'Kamala Harris is married' post gets pushback
content: Amid the row, far-right activist Laura Loomer posed a question that backfired on her. "Kamala Harris is married. Why isn't her last name Emhoff?" Laura posted only to be shut down by Democrats who reminded her that Ivanka Trump is also married to Jared Kushner but does not use Kushner as the surname.
summary: Amid the row, far-right activist Laura Loomer posed a question that backfired on her. "Kamala Harris is married. Why isn't her last name Emhoff?" Laura posted only to be shut down by Democrats who reminded her that Ivanka Trump is also married to Jared Kushner but does not use Kushner as the surname.

title: 'Audacity of a man...': Kamala Harris' ex-boyfriend slams Trump after 'Black or Indian' comment
content: Actor and television host Montel Williams criticized the statements that Donald Trump put out at the convention of the Black journalists putting Kamala Harris' ethnicity to question and spouting many more 'disagreeable' remarks. Trump said Kamala Harris always claimed to be Indian until she 'turned' Black triggering a major backlash.
summary: Actor and television host Montel Williams criticized the statements that Donald Trump put out at the convention of the Black journalists putting Kamala Harris' ethnicity to question and spouting many more 'disagreeable' remarks. Trump said Kamala Harris always claimed to be Indian until she 'turned' Black triggering a major backlash.

title: Bangladesh bans Jamaat-e-Islami and its student wing Islami Chhatra Shibir under anti-terrorism law
content: Bangladesh banned Jamaat-e-Islami and its student wing Islami Chhatra Shibir under anti-terrorism laws following deadly protests over government job quotas, which left at least 150 people dead. The government accused the party of instigating violence and exploiting the student-led movement. The ban was enacted through an executive order and was supported by the ruling Awami League-led alliance.
summary: Bangladesh banned Jamaat-e-Islami and its student wing Islami Chhatra Shibir under anti-terrorism laws following deadly protests over government job quotas, which left at least 150 people dead. The government accused the party of instigating violence and exploiting the student-led movement. The ban was enacted through an executive order and was supported by the ruling Awami League-led alliance.

title: Did Donald Trump 'steal' journalist's water bottle with no intention to drink? Video goes viral
content: A video of former US President Donald Trump fiddling with a bottle of water at the National Association pf Black Journalists' convention in Chicago Wednesday went viral with claims that Trump actually tightened the cap of the bottle after he was roasted by ABC's Rachel Scott. ​"WHY did Donald Trump mess with Rachel's water bottle? Was he upset with her questions? Did he think tightening the lid would stop her from asking questions?" a user wrote sharing the viral clip.
summary: A video of former US President Donald Trump fiddling with a bottle of water at the National Association pf Black Journalists' convention in Chicago Wednesday went viral with claims that Trump actually tightened the cap of the bottle after he was roasted by ABC's Rachel Scott. ​"WHY did Donald Trump mess with Rachel's water bottle? Was he upset with her questions? Did he think tightening the lid would stop her from asking questions?" a user wrote sharing the viral clip.

title: Pakistan's cultural capital sees record rainfall, flooding streets and affecting daily life
content: Lahore experienced record-high rainfall, causing flash floods and leading to three deaths. Streets and hospitals were inundated, overwhelming drainage systems and affecting daily life. The current spell of monsoon rains, expected to last a week, follows a month where over 100 rain-related deaths were recorded, primarily in Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa provinces.
summary: Lahore experienced record-high rainfall, causing flash floods and leading to three deaths. Streets and hospitals were inundated, overwhelming drainage systems and affecting daily life. The current spell of monsoon rains, expected to last a week, follows a month where over 100 rain-related deaths were recorded, primarily in Punjab and Khyber Pakhtunkhwa provinces.

title: Dark side of the loon: Trump says Kamala was Indian before she 'turned black'
content: Former President Donald Trump targeted Kamala Harris with racially-loaded remarks, suggesting she transitioned from Indian heritage to black identity for political gain. At an event for black journalists, Trump falsely questioned her black identity, trying to sow discord. Harris, attending a black sorority meeting, dismissed Trump’s divisive comments, focusing on unity and support for her base.
summary: Former President Donald Trump targeted Kamala Harris with racially-loaded remarks, suggesting she transitioned from Indian heritage to black identity for political gain. At an event for black journalists, Trump falsely questioned her black identity, trying to sow discord. Harris, attending a black sorority meeting, dismissed Trump’s divisive comments, focusing on unity and support for her base.
